name: Surbma | Datepicker localization for Gravity Forms
author: Surbma

sections.description: Localize the Gravity Forms (affiliate link) Datepicker field with this plugin’s automatic localization. There is no need to do anything, just activate the plugin. The js file will load only with the Gravity Forms (affiliate link) form, so there will be no unwanted extra load for your website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload surbma-datepicker-localization-for-gravity-forms folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Surbma | Datepicker localization for Gravity Forms plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
Is it working with other form management plugins?

No. It is working only with Gravity Forms (affiliate link).

What does Surbma mean?

It is the reverse version of my last name. ðŸ˜‰
sections.changelog:
2.0

Release date: 2020-02-10

  • TWEAK – Tested with WordPress 5.3 version.
  • TWEAK – Updated to use a new way to deploy it to wp.org repo.

1.3.1

  • Fixed localization.

1.3.0

  • Prevent direct access to the plugin.

1.2.5

  • Fixed script enqueue. It is now sure to be after the datepicker script. (Thank you Vayu Robins!)
  • Checked to be compatible with WordPress 4.1 and Gravity Forms 1.9.

1.2.4

  • Fixed readme.txt

1.2.3

  • Fixed readme.txt

1.2.2

  • Changed description and installation texts.
  • Added pot file for translations.
  • Added hungarian translation.

1.2.1

  • Changed donate link.
  • Changed short description.

1.2.0

  • First commit to the official WordPress repo.
